sub_title: S&OP | Supply Chain | Manufacturing | Production Planning
summary:
I am Senior professional in Production Planning and Supply Planning. During my 20 years of experience in the tire industry, I have worked in 3 different multinational companies and 2 different countries.
I am a results-driven, solution-oriented professional with significant leadership expertise in bringing strategy to execution and driving operational excellence.

Highlights:
👉 Accomplished Supply Chain & Production Planning professional with over 20 years of global experience in the manufacturing domain, ten years of which were in Lean/Operational Excellence leadership roles.
👉 Expert at executing automated manufacturing systems and operational excellence initiatives; while enhancing performance, multiplying productivity, improving quality, reducing costs, and generating sustainable EBITDA gains.
👉 Adroit in establishing, leading, and developing Continuous Improvement teams in Industry 4.0 framework.
👉 Efficiently managed annual Capex budgets up to €4 million.
👉 Have led multi-cultural teams of 25 direct reports.
👉 Active Professional Certification of Supply Chain Management in University of Cape Town

Areas of Expertise:
🎯 Production Planning
🎯 Supply Chain Planning and S&OP
🎯 Demand Planning
🎯 Continuous Improvement 
🎯 Operational Modelling & Analytics 
🎯 Creative Problem Solving 
🎯 Persuasion and Negotiation 
🎯 Budget Control and Cost Reduction 
🎯 Manufacturing Operations Management 
🎯 Systems Thinking 
🎯 Change Management 
🎯 Team Leadership, Training, and Development

profile_positions.title: Capacity Planning Europe

profile_positions.location: Amesterdão, Holanda do Norte, Países Baixos
profile_positions.description:
Global responsible for Factory Physics that is the definition of Work in Process across the plants in Europe and India. Implementation of a new methodology to calculate Material Handling inside of facilities.
I work with the PPC of all Apollo plants to define the best way to do the scheduling
profile_positions.title: Senior Specialist Corporate IE

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for planning and production control of the passenger and truck tire factories in Camaçari. Also responsible for the plant's Shift Managers, I had 25 direct employees and developed the plant planning modernization project, targeting the bottlenecks and thereby improving the production flow at the plant.
Drive shop floor’s efforts to focus on the company’s goals, such as: Volume, Size Achievement, Quality, Safety, Cost Reduction, Efficiency
SAP-PP key user: provide solution/consultancy for all SAP-PP related issues and topics
Responsible for ensuring fulfillment of the production plan as requested by the market
profile_positions.title: Head of Scheduling (Production Planning Manager)

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for S&OP cycle in South America
- Import and Export Responsibility
- 8 employees (Supply Planners, Inventory Manager, Data analysts)
profile_positions.title: Responsible of South America S&OP and Coordinator of Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for forecasting cargo tire sales in South America and Central America. With direct participation in sales plans and annual budget definition.
- With an accuracy of over 85% in the Brazilian market and 60% in the South American market. With this accuracy, we were able to reduce the company's inventory policy in 2 days.
- Responsible for the forecast process & monthly presentation of Demand Review meeting for the Directors and the President of Michelin South America.
profile_positions.title: Forecast Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Strategic planner of industrial capacity. Transcription of the production requirement to the factory based on sales forecasts, stocks targets and expected regulations. Always respecting the S&OP cycle. 
- Responsible for the mold purchasing strategy for the factory and installed capacity by size.
- Responsible to animate Supply Review Meeting.
- Responsible to animate Sourcing Committee Meeting with Marketing, Technical, Financial and Industry teams.
profile_positions.title: Capacity Planning

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the planning and production control of the truck tire site, with 10 direct employees. I had the challenge to evolve the planning process, managing the new process implemented by Supply Chain (Demand to Cash). In this position, I was also able to participate in the evolution of the way of planning defined by the company and thus be considered the planning model to be followed by the other plants of the company.
profile_positions.title: Manager of Planning and Control of Production

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the implementation of the production control system and production flow (FyT) at the truck tire site. Implementation of the production planning and control system in PPC (MMRP).
profile_positions.title: Business Project Leader

profile_positions.description: Responsible for managing the efficiency of 5 extruders, where 1 of them was the factory bottleneck. With 112 direct employees, I was able to improve the department's productivity and was responsible for implementing the Michelin Manufacturing Way / Lean Manufacturing (MMW) in my department.
profile_positions.title: Business Unit Leader

profile_positions.description: Responsibility for developing innovative solutions for machine parts that were no longer manufactured. Standardization of warehouse parts and reduction of inventory value
profile_positions.title: Project Engineering
